module Plexams.CLI.Helper.Types
data Command
PrepareStudentRegs :: Command
PrepareAncodes :: Command
CheckAncodes :: Command
GetStudsForAncode :: Integer -> Command
data Config
Config :: Command -> Maybe String -> FilePath -> Maybe FilePath -> Config
[optCommand] :: Config -> Command
[group] :: Config -> Maybe String
[infile] :: Config -> FilePath
[outfile] :: Config -> Maybe FilePath
data Exam
Exam :: Integer -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Exam
[ancode] :: Exam -> Integer
[titel] :: Exam -> Text
[stg] :: Exam -> Text
[pruefer] :: Exam -> Text
instance GHC.Show.Show Plexams.CLI.Helper.Types.Exam
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Plexams.CLI.Helper.Types.Exam

module Plexams.CLI.Helper.Config
configmain :: (Config -> IO ()) -> IO ()

module Plexams.CLI.Helper.Commands
runCommand :: Config -> IO ()

module Plexams.CLI.Types
data Command
Markdown :: Command
HTML :: Maybe [Integer] -> Command
[showConflictsAncodes] :: Command -> Maybe [Integer]
Statistics :: Bool -> Command
[initialStatistics] :: Command -> Bool
Dot :: Bool -> Command
[groupDependencies] :: Command -> Bool
Validate :: Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Command
[validateSources] :: Command -> Bool
[validateSchedule] :: Command -> Bool
[validateRooms] :: Command -> Bool
[validateInvigilation] :: Command -> Bool

[bywhat] :: Command -> QueryWhat
[onlyUnscheduled] :: Command -> Bool
[minimalOutput] :: Command -> Bool
Export :: ExportWhat -> Command
[what] :: Command -> ExportWhat
PrintConfig :: Command
Generate :: Bool -> Command
[scheduleSameNames] :: Command -> Bool
GenerateRooms :: Command
GenerateInvigilations :: Command
data Config
Config :: Command -> Maybe FilePath -> Bool -> Bool -> Config
[optCommand] :: Config -> Command
[outfile] :: Config -> Maybe FilePath
[novalidation] :: Config -> Bool
[verbose] :: Config -> Bool
data QueryWhat
ByAncode :: Integer -> QueryWhat
ByName :: String -> QueryWhat
ByLecturer :: String -> QueryWhat
ByGroup :: String -> QueryWhat
ByRegisteredGroup :: String -> QueryWhat
BySlot :: (Int, Int) -> QueryWhat
StudentByName :: String -> QueryWhat
data ExportWhat
ZPA :: ExportWhat
Handicaps :: ExportWhat
PlanForStudents :: ExportWhat
StudentsForZPA :: ExportWhat
Exports :: ExportWhat
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Plexams.CLI.Types.Command
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Plexams.CLI.Types.ExportWhat
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Plexams.CLI.Types.QueryWhat

module Plexams.CLI.Config
configmain :: (Config -> IO ()) -> IO ()
